solution_line_template: If the tree's {num_branches} branches have {sub_branches_per_branch} sub-branches each, the total number of sub-branches on the tree is {num_branches}*{sub_branches_per_branch} = <<{num_branches}*{sub_branches_per_branch}={total_sub_branches_per_tree}>>{total_sub_branches_per_tree}

Since each sub-branch has {leaves_per_sub_branch} leaves, the tree has {leaves_per_sub_branch}*{total_sub_branches_per_tree} = <<{leaves_per_sub_branch}*{total_sub_branches_per_tree}={leaves_per_tree}>>{leaves_per_tree} leaves.

If there are {total_trees_on_farm} trees on the farm with the same number of leaves, they all have {leaves_per_tree}*{total_trees_on_farm} = <<{leaves_per_tree}*{total_trees_on_farm}={total_leaves_on_all_trees}>>{total_leaves_on_all_trees} leaves.
